# dnacenter_device_credential_delete (Data Source)

It performs delete operation on Network Settings.

- Delete device credential.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dnacenter_device_credential_delete" "example" {
  provider = dnacenter
  id       = "string"
}
```
